channel.title: Changing spell names in spell book!
channel.description: Need help changing the spell name in the mage book and the number of runes needed! So instead of varrock tele, it would say "seers" or somthing. and all the runes would be put down to 0. Thank you!

item.title: Changing spell names in spell book!
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

Good enough THANK YOU VERY MUCH!

Read full topic
item.source: Changing spell names in spell book!

item.title: Changing spell names in spell book!
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Sorry vato, only shit servers have a texthandler.java tbh…you can’t write over the runes serverside, but a sendframe126 should work for the text. and now that i think about it…a sendframe246 might work for the runes… ponders

Read full topic
item.source: Changing spell names in spell book!

go to texthandler.java
